"I remind myself of the influential individuals who came before me ‚Äì both men and women ‚Äì who understood the importance of equitable rights for all. I consider the amount of time, effort, and passion spent, and then how the battle continues even today. Most importantly, I make one resolution each year to mentor or coach another woman to support her towards a goal she has." - Cara Baez, Senior Director of Center for Excellence
